content.rendered:
Satsang Services

Association with truth.

Includes a special attraction of Sravana Bhakti, the first activity of Bhakti Yoga which means hearing of Lord’s Lilas in the form of spiritual discourse with the company of Pujya Guruji.

Meaning of Satsang

Significance of Satsang

Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship Form 

Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship Form (PDF)

Weekend Satsang:

Sunday Afternoon Satsang Activities (Free Preeti Bhoj)

Saturday Afternoon Satsang Activities (Preeti Bhoj with fee: $12 person)

Weekday Satsang (Every Friday Evening):

Shrimad Bhagavad-Gita Satsang Group (Preeti Bhoj with fee: $12 person)

Other Special Occasions (Preeti Bhoj with fee: $12 per person):

Occasions Followed by Satsang 

Satsang Schedule

Satsang Hours:

Weekdays : 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM
Weekends & Holidays: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM and 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM
